publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3589 Bill Aitken: Sexual Offences (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Justice Committee considers the Sexual Offences (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: sections 1 to 8, section 13, sections 9 to 12, sections 14 to 37, schedule 1, section 38, schedule 2, sections 39 to 42, schedule 3, sections 43 to 48, schedules 4 and 5, section 49 and the long title.
